title: Hurricane Ian Impacts and Unexpected Start for the Big 12
description:
Wendi Nix, Joey Galloway, and Greg McElroy share updated game schedules in preparation for Hurricane Ian, preview the ACC Top-10 matchup between Clemson and NC State, and take an updated look at the Big 12's playoff chances following Oklahoma's and Texas's losses last weekend. Plus, Pete Thamel joins the show to discuss the coaching vacancies at Georgia Tech, Nebraska, and Arizona State.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew discusses East Coast teams bracing for Hurricane Ian impact and state of the Big 12 following Week 4 upsets and a surprising undefeated team
